title: Skeleton Hellhound (Vet'ion)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Skeleton Hellhound is a monster summoned by Vet'ion. Two spawn during the first form of Vet'ion after half of his health has depleted and must be killed as he is immune to attacks while they are present.

content:
This article is about the minion summoned by Vet'ion. For the skeleton hellhound fought during the In Search of the Myreque quest, see Skeleton Hellhound.
For the skeleton hellhound fought during the second phase of Vet'ion, see Greater Skeleton Hellhound.

The Skeleton Hellhound is a monster summoned by Vet'ion. Two spawn during the first form of Vet'ion after half of his health has depleted and must be killed as he is immune to attacks while they are present.

Contents

  • 1 Drops
    • 1.1 100%
    • 1.2 Tertiary
    • 1.3 Wilderness Slayer tertiary

  2. ↑ Only dropped if access to Champions' Guild is available, and the Skeleton Champion hasn't been previously killed in the Champions' Challenge.

The '''Skeleton Hellhound''' is a monster summoned by [[Vet'ion]]. Two spawn during the first form of Vet'ion after half of his health has depleted and must be killed as he is immune to attacks while they are present.
